## Remarks The CssClassPropertyAttribute class is used by developers to add design time Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) editing capabilities to a property in a property grid.
CssClassPropertyAttribute is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](../Topic/.NET%20Framework%20Versions%20and%20Dependencies.md).
